scenes.visual_description: Close-up on a finger tapping a phone screen.  The screen glows with vibrant, digital comic book art style UI elements, highlighting a button labeled 'Pro Effects'. The background is a blurred cityscape at night, rendered in a similar comic book style.

Dynamic split-screen.  Left side shows dull, desaturated footage of a skateboarder attempting a trick and failing. Right side shows the same footage, now color-graded with intense, stylized hues and slow-motion, showcasing the trick flawlessly. The style remains vibrant, digital comic book art.

The skateboarder lands the trick, striking a pose.  Dynamic motion lines and stylized light flares surround them, giving the scene a dramatic, comic book cover feel. The backdrop is the vibrant cityscape at night.
